title: A rising star in Austin!
posting_body: Text ID # 9979A to my cell for more info!
Sophisticated apartments and an upgraded lifestyle await you, in a premier luxury high-rise community in the heart of downtown Austin, Texas.

From top-of-the-line apartment features like granite counter tops and floor-to-ceiling windows to impressive community amenities that include a cutting-edge fitness center and a swimming pool with a sundeck, this community excels above the competition.
A rising star in Austin, this community has high standards when it comes to luxury living.
As a resident, you'll enjoy unlimited access to exclusive amenities that will simplify your lifestyle and help you relax, socialize and get things done.
Plan a movie night in the multi-media room or a pool party and barbecue on the community grounds.
You can also take your furry friend for a walk and enjoy beautiful views of Lady Bird Lake.
To top it off, all of these amenities are backed by a responsive and reliable management and maintenance team.
One of the most attractive features of this luxury community is its convenient location in downtown Austin near Hill Country and South Congress.
This neighborhood gives you prime access to highly rated restaurants, stylish shops and boutiques, and exciting nightlife options.
Whether you want to catch live music or check out the latest fashion trends, everything is right outside your door in 2nd Street District.
